name: ImagePRO-II Jr
description: For sale are 4 ImagePRO-II Jr. they have lived in shock mount racks their whole life. The Barco ImagePRO-II Jr. is an advanced high performance all-in-one video scaler, scan converter, switcher and transcoder converting any input signal format to any output format. ImagePRO-II supports Universal Analog, DVI signal, and SD/HD/3G SDI signal formats. Loop-through outputs are provided for the Analog, DVI and SDI input and genlock signals
